Text.Page:
I never thought that something like this could happen.

Our resolution must not waver!

The time has come to put an end to Samael's treachery. He's betrayed everything we've fought for and put the entire federation at risk. Are you ready?<TEXTBUTTON>"On my honor, it won't."</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>"We'll take him together..."</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
